document.full_text: "asuncion," a play by and featuring mr. eisenberg, the oscar-nominated "social network" star, will be presented by the theater company starting in october as part of its 2011-12 season.
document.title: rattlestick playwrights theater likes jesse eisenberg play for its new season
lines_and_colors: "asuncion," a play by and featuring mr. eisenberg, the oscar-nominated "social network" star, will be presented by the theater company starting in october as part of its 2011-12 season.
